overview:
Darren is a mobile entrepreneur and internet marketer. Darren currently serves as CEO of GoLive! Mobile, named by Inc Magazine as the #1 fastest growing media company in the country. With four global offices and more than 100 employees, GoLive has generated more than $200 million in transactions.

Darren also serves as co-founder and CEO of PocketLead, which is a mobile performance agency specializing in lead generation specific to mobile.

Darren started his career at Yahoo and was also (very) briefly an IP attorney after graduating from UCLA Law School and UC Berkeley’s Haas School of Business, where he graduated Phi Beta Kappa.

Darren is a frequent speaker and presenter about all things mobile. He also acts as an advisor and investor to several mobile companies in Southern California, including Airpush, where he acts as the company’s lead advisor since pre-launch.
